mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.banner_id , a.banner_name , a.banner_title , a.banner_content , a.banner_description , a.banner_source , a.ref_address , b.bposition_name , a.banner_mktime FROM banner a LEFT OUTER JOIN bpositiondir b ON a.bposition_id = b.bposition_id LEFT OUTER JOIN bstatusdir c ON a.bstatus_id = c.bstatus_id WHERE c.bstatus_id = 0 ORDER BY a.banner_mktime DESC
